definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Breathe out through pursed lips as if you were whistling.
sentences.chinese: 从闭合嘴唇中呼气，就好像在吹口哨。

sentences.english: The whales expired with a rushing sound.
sentences.chinese: 那些鲸鱼呼气时发出一种急促的声音。

sentences.english: Engage and exhale to do an Attitude Press in non-traditional Pilates.
sentences.chinese: 参与和呼气做非传统普拉提一种态度出版社。

sentences.english: The inulin hydrogen breath test accurately reflects orocaecal transit time.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉氢呼气试验精确反映口盲传输时间。

sentences.english: Two arms curving and inspiration, supporting and expiration.
sentences.chinese: 两臂弯曲时吸气，撑直时呼气。

sentences.english: Stop yanking at my shawl; I can't breathe.
sentences.chinese: 别拉着我的围巾不放，我不能呼气了。

sentences.english: The accused question the result of the breathalyser test.
sentences.chinese: 被告对呼气测醉试验结果表示怀疑。

sentences.english: When the head is stable, sword arm enters water, resumptive below one slowly expiratory process.
sentences.chinese: 头部稳定时，右臂入水，再开始下一慢慢呼气的过程。

sentences.english: Ever notice the fog you can make on a window by breathing on it?
sentences.chinese: 是否有注意过自己往窗户上呼气形成的水雾呢？

sentences.english: C-octanoic acid breath test may represent a feasible method for measurement of gastric emptying.
sentences.chinese: 辛酸呼气试验是检测胃排空的理想选择。

sentences.english: On the exhale bend your elbows and lower your chest onto your thighs.
sentences.chinese: 呼气时曲手肘，胸部向下放于大腿上。

sentences.english: Exhale and lean to right keeping hips and buttocks flat on floor.
sentences.chinese: 呼气向右倾斜，保持髋部和臀平贴于地面。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of maximal expiratory flow on the ventilatory response to exercise.
sentences.chinese: 目的本文探讨了最大呼气量对运动通气反应的影响。

sentences.english: As you exhale, rock your pelvis forward and release.
sentences.chinese: 而当你呼气时，将盆骨往前移同时放松肌肉。

sentences.english: There are no words or language; their voice makes no sound.
sentences.chinese: 把一次呼气切换成各不相同的声音就形成了语言。

definition: to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated
diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
to feel suffocated or oppressed/to choke with resentment/to feel injured or resentful
